bill.title: Relating To Human Services.
bill.description: Establishes the Hawaii public housing authority public housing tenant upward mobility pilot program. Permits the Hawaii public housing authority to contract with outside parties to implement the program. Appropriates funds. Effective 6/30/3000. (HD2)

history.action: Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 01-31-23 9:30AM in conference room 329 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee recommends that the measure pass with amendments, for recommittal for further consideration. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Mizuno, Belatti, Ilagan, Kobayashi, Takenouchi, Nishimoto, Garcia; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Amato.
Reported from HUS (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 21) as amended in HD 1, recommending recommittal to HUS for further consideration.
Recommitted to HUS as amended in HD 1 with none voting no and Representative(s) Amato, Nakashima, Woodson excused.
Re-referred to HUS, HSG, FIN, referral sheet 8
Bill scheduled to be heard by HUS on Tuesday, 02-07-23 8:30AM in House conference room 329 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on HUS recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Mizuno, Amato, Belatti, Ilagan, Kobayashi, Takenouchi, Nishimoto, Garcia; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from HUS (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 231) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to HSG.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 2 and referred to the committee(s) on HSG with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Kila, Lamosao excused (2).
Bill scheduled to be heard by HSG on Wednesday, 02-15-23 9:30AM in House conference room 312 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on HSG recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Hashimoto, Aiu, Kila, Kitagawa, Marten, Todd, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Onishi; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from HSG (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 627), recommending referral to FIN.
Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Marten excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-24-23 11:30AM in House conference room 308 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 15 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Kitagawa, Aiu, Chun, Cochran, Kahaloa, Kila, Kobayashi, Lamosao, Morikawa, Nishimoto, Poepoe, Takenouchi, Alcos, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Garrett.

subjects.subject_name: Public Housing Tenant Upward Mobility Pilot Program
